Temperature (\u00b0C).description: The temperature in degree Celsius at which the manufacturing process is performed.

Pressure (kPa).description: The pressure in kilopascal applied during the manufacturing process.

Temperature x Pressure.description: The product of the temperature and pressure used in the manufacturing process.

Material Fusion Metric.description: A metric to measure the fusion of the material during the manufacturing process.

Material Transformation Metric.description: A metric to measure the transformation of the material during the manufacturing process.

Quality Rating.description: The quality rating of the manufacturing process, likely on a scale from 0 to 100.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in manufacturing process analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the manufacturing process, such as temperature, pressure, and material metrics, please predict the quality rating.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in manufacturing process analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the manufacturing process, such as temperature, pressure, and quality rating, please predict the material transformation metric.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted material transformation metric is:.

prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted material fusion metric is:.
